_header: Thou art mild thine is the might of the kingric of heaven
_description: On those who will inherit the kingdom of heaven, in a Latin sermon — six alliterative non-rhyming lines

CULIi38.First Lines:
Þou ter mylde þyn is þe myth of þe kyngriche of
                    heueneþou doutest nouth þe dredful dom of þe last
                    day…
CULIi38.Last Lines:
…þe mai lette anglene non creature to come to for god
                    boldelyche hereþou biddist þi bone & passest nouth withouten
                    spedyngge
CULIi38.Editions:
Erb,  Peter C. 
             “Vernacular Material for Preaching in MS Camb. Univ. Lib.
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         33 (1971): 63-84: 81.
